entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:13 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:13 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:13 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
